annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Volume: Nissan will achieve global sales of 4.2 million units in fiscal 2008-an increase of 812,000 units over fiscal 2004.
annotations.translation: 销量：日产将在2008财年实现420万辆的全球销量，比2004财年增加812,000辆。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: ROIC: Nissan will achieve a 20 percent or higher return on invested capital on average over the course of the plan, excluding cash on hand.
annotations.translation: 投资资本回报率ROIC：在计划期间，日产汽车的平均投资资本回报率将达到 20% 或更高，不包括库存现金。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: To meet this commitment, over the NISSAN Value-Up period we will launch 28 new products, including 10 models that are highly innovative in their concept and benefits.
annotations.translation: 为了实现这一承诺，我们将在 "NISSAN Value-Up "期间推出 28 款新产品，其中包括 10 款在概念和优点上都极具创新性的车型。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Our investment in advanced technology continues. From fiscal 2002 to 2005 we have increased spending on research and development by 50 percent. Over the next three years we will invest a further 5 percent of net sales annually, creating new and exciting technologies to benefit our customers.
annotations.translation: 我们对先进技术的投资仍在继续。从 2002 财年到 2005 财年，我们在研发方面的支出增加了 50%。在接下来的三年里，我们将每年再投资净销售额的5%，创造令人兴奋的新技术，使我们的客户受益。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: During NISSAN Value-Up we will pursue several key business opportunities:
annotations.translation: 在日产提升价值期间，我们将追求几个关键业务机会：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: NISSAN Value-Up also delivers increased value for our shareholders through a clear and well-defined dividend strategy. By the end of the plan period, we will pay an annual dividend of no less than ¥40 per share, a 66 percent increase over fiscal 2004.
annotations.translation: 日产价值提升计划还通过清晰明了的股息策略，为股东带来了更高的价值。到计划期末，我们将支付不低于每股40日元的年度股息，比2004财年高出66%。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: What should investors expect from Nissan's share price? Over the long-term, share prices reflect fundamentals. But in the short-term share prices are driven by performance against expectations.
annotations.translation: 投资者应该对日产的股价有什么期望？从长远来看，股价反映了基本面。但在短期内，股价是由业绩预期驱动的。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: In Nissan's case, recent share price trends signal market expectations that greater uncertainty will result in lower growth. So our challenge is to both manage those expectations and to exceed them. This supports our belief in a high level of disclosure and transparency.
annotations.translation: 以日产为例，近期股价走势表明，市场预期更大的不确定性将导致增长放缓。因此，我们的挑战是既要管理这些期望，又要超越它们。这支持我们相信披露和透明度很高。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Our business plans and commitments, and our ability to communicate our strategy clearly, are the most effective means to convey transparency. But we recognize that financial announcements alone are no longer sufficient communication for the markets. We need to provide more forward-looking information and to avoid surprises that create uncertainty for shareholders and investors.
annotations.translation: 我们的业务计划和承诺，以及清楚传达我们战略的能力，是传达透明度的最有效方式。但我们认识到，仅凭金融公告已不足以让市场充分沟通。我们需要提供更具前瞻性的信息，避免出现给股东和投资者带来不确定性的意外情况。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: We intend to serve the professional investment community better in fiscal 2005. We will also extend our welcome to individual investors-whose numbers grew by 51,323 in fiscal 2004, increasing our list to 193,000 shareholders.
annotations.translation: 我们打算在2005财年更好地为专业投资界服务。我们还将欢迎个人投资者，他们的人数在2004财年增长了51,323人，使我们的股东名单增加到19.3万人。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: That growing interest in Nissan was apparent in the turnout of more than 1,800 people at our June 21 shareholders' meeting in Yokohama. Questions from the shareholders were many and varied, but it was encouraging to hear in each one a passionate commitment to Nissan. This year, and in the future, I hope we merit such support from all our shareholders as we create lasting value in a transparent way.
annotations.translation: 6月21日在横滨举行的股东大会上，有1800多人参加了日产股东大会，这体现了人们对日产日益增长的兴趣。股东们提出的问题多种多样，但听到每个股东对日产的热情承诺令人鼓舞。今年和将来，我希望我们值得所有股东的支持，因为我们以透明的方式创造持久的价值。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Carlos Ghosn
annotations.translation: Carlos Ghosn

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Carlos Ghosn
annotations.translation: Carlos Ghosn

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: President and Chief Executive Officer
annotations.translation: 总裁兼首席执行官

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: LETTER FROM CEO
annotations.translation: CEO致函

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Share price performance
annotations.translation: 股价表现

annotations.label: Page-footer
annotations.text: Nissan Annual Report
annotations.translation: 日产年报

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: ▪ Our Infiniti luxury brand will extend its reach into new markets such as China and Russia and continue to establish its credibility as a Tier-1 luxury player.
annotations.translation: ▪ 我们的英菲尼迪豪华品牌将拓展其触角至中国和俄罗斯等新市场，并继续建立其作为一级豪华品牌的信誉。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: ▪ We will develop our Light Commercial Vehicle business into a fully competitive global operation through new market and product entries.
annotations.translation: ▪ 我们将通过新的市场和产品进入，将我们的轻型商用车业务发展成为具有充分竞争力的全球运营。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: ▪ We will take a more efficient global sourcing approach to maximize our opportunities and minimize our overall costs as we grow. Our engineering, production and purchasing functions will continue their acceleration towards being fully integrated global operations.
annotations.translation: 随着▪ 我们的发展，我们将采取更有效的全球采购方法，以最大限度地利用我们的机会，并将总体成本降至最低。我们的工程、生产和采购职能部门将继续加速实现全面整合的全球运营。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: ▪ We will continue to invest in new and emerging markets, including China, India and Russia.
annotations.translation: ▪ 我们将继续投资于新兴市场，包括中国、印度和俄罗斯。
